statements: SELECT * FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE appointment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE preference_1 = 'Massage';
SELECT reservation_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT reservation_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE customer_id = 456 AND appointment_date = '2022-02-02';
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE preference_1 = 'Facial' OR preference_2 = 'Manicure';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, appointment_time FROM spa_reservation WHERE appointment_date = '2022-03-03';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, preference_1 FROM spa_reservation WHERE customer_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT MAX(customer_id) FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT DISTINCT preference_1 FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, preference_1, preference_2 FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE customer_id IN (123, 456);
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE appointment_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, appointment_date FROM spa_reservation WHERE preference_1 = 'Massage';
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND preference_2 LIKE '%manicure%';
SELECT customer_id, appointment_time FROM spa_reservation WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE customer_id = 1002 AND (preference_1 = 'Facial' OR preference_2 = 'Pedicure');
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, preference_1 FROM spa_reservation WHERE appointment_date = (SELECT MAX(appointment_date) FROM spa_reservation);
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM spa_reservation WHERE appointment_date > '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM spa_reservation WHERE appointment_date < '2022-08-20' AND (preference_1 = 'Massage' OR preference_2 = 'Facial');
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spa_reservation;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM spa_reservation GROUP BY customer_id...
SELECT * FROM spa_appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, customer_id, appointment_date FROM spa_appointments WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT appointment_date FROM spa_appointments;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM spa_appointments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_therapist_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_therapist_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, favorite_service FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM spa_appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, time_slot ASC;
SELECT customer_id, appointment_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, therapist_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-02-14' AND time_slot = '10:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date FROM spa_appointments WHERE therapist_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM spa_appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(appointment_date) AS latest_appointment_date FROM spa_appointments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM spa_appointments GROUP BY therapist_id ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_service FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_service LIKE '%massage%';
SELECT customer_id, favorite_therapist_id, preferred_time FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003);
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot, therapist_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id = 1005;
SELECT appointment_id, customer_id, therapist_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-03-20' AND therapist_id = 4;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_therapist_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_therapist_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM spa_appointments WHERE therapist_id IS NULL GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 1;
SELECT * FROM spa_appointments WHERE therapist_id = 1 AND appointment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT appointment_id, customer_id, appointment_date, therapist_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE time_slot BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '15:00:00'
SELECT customer_id, favorite_therapist_id, favorite_service FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_therapist_id = 3
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, time_slot, therapist_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE therapist_id = (SELECT favorite_therapist_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 200)
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_service LIKE '%massage%')
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id = 150 AND therapist_id = (SELECT therapist_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 150)

SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments JOIN customer_preferences ON spa_appointments.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id WHERE customer_preferences.preferred_time = spa_appointments.time_slot
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_service IS NOT NULL)

SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_therapist_id IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_time = '11:00:00')
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, time_slot, therapist_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE therapist_id IN (SELECT favorite_therapist_id FROM customer_preferences)
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE therapist_id IN (SELECT therapist_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id = 250) ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT appointment_id, customer_id, appointment_date, therapist_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_therapist_id = therapist_id)
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_time > '14:00:00')
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id = 160 AND therapist_id = (SELECT therapist_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 160)

SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments JOIN customer_preferences ON spa_appointments.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id WHERE customer_preferences.favorite_service = 'facial'

SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_therapist_id = therapist_id) ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_time = '10:30:00')

SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, time_slot, therapist_id FROM spa_appointments WHERE therapist_id IN (SELECT favorite_therapist_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_service = 'massage')
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, therapist_name FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_therapist FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT preferred_service, wellness_goal FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT * FROM spa_services;
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM spa_services;
SELECT description, price FROM spa_services;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, therapist_name, service_name FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_therapist, preferred_service, wellness_goal FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT service_id, service_name, description, price FROM spa_services;

SELECT r.reservation_id, r.appointment_date, r.appointment_time, c.favorite_therapist, c.preferred_service, s.description, s.price FROM spa_reservations r, customer_preferences c, spa_services s WHERE r.customer_id = c.customer_id AND r.service_name = s.service_name;

SELECT r.reservation_id, r.appointment_date, r.appointment_time, c.favorite_therapist, c.preferred_service, s.description, s.price FROM spa_reservations r JOIN customer_preferences c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN spa_services s ON r.service_name = s.service_name;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations WHERE therapist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM spa_services WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations WHERE customer_id = 123 AND appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE wellness_goal = 'Relaxation';
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, appointment_date, therapist_name FROM spa_reservations WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT therapist_name FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT appointment_date, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM spa_reservations GROUP BY appointment_date;
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, therapist_name FROM spa_reservations JOIN customer_preferences ON spa_reservations.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_therapist = 'Alice');
SELECT DISTINCT service_name FROM spa_reservations JOIN spa_services ON spa_reservations.service_name = spa_services.service_name;
SELECT reservation_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, therapist_name FROM spa_reservations WHERE reservation_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, therapist_name FROM spa_reservations WHERE therapist_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, therapist_name, service_name FROM spa_reservations WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, therapist_name FROM spa_reservations WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE wellness_goal = 'stress relief');
SELECT customer_id, therapist_name, service_name FROM spa_reservations WHERE therapist_name IN (SELECT favorite_therapist FROM customer_preferences);
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT therapist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM spa_reservations GROUP BY therapist_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT service_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM spa_services GROUP BY service_name HAVING AVG(price) > 50;
SELECT reservation_id, appointment_date, therapist_name FROM spa_reservations WHERE reservation_id BETWEEN 1001 AND 1010;
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, therapist_name, service_name FROM spa_reservations ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, therapist_name, service_name, description, price FROM spa_reservations JOIN spa_services ON spa_reservations.service_name = spa_services.service_name;

SELECT therapist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM spa_reservations WHERE therapist_name = 'Alice' UNION SELECT therapist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM spa_reservations WHERE therapist_name = 'Bob';
SELECT customer_id, therapist_name, service_name, price FROM spa_reservations JOIN spa_services ON spa_reservations.service_name = spa_services.service_name WHERE price < 100;
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, therapist, service FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, age, membership_status FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM services;
SELECT service_id, service_name, category, price, duration FROM services;
SELECT * FROM preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_therapist, preferred_service FROM preferences;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, therapist, service FROM spa_reservations WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, age, membership_status FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT service_id, service_name, category, price, duration FROM services WHERE service_id = 1;
SELECT preferred_therapist, preferred_service FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_therapist, preferred_service FROM preferences WHERE preferred_therapist = 'John';
SELECT customer_id, preferred_therapist, preferred_service FROM preferences WHERE preferred_service = 'Massage';
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations WHERE appointment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, age, membership_status FROM customers WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT service_id, service_name, category, price, duration FROM services WHERE price <= 100.00;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, therapist, service FROM spa_reservations WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, age, membership_status FROM customers WHERE membership_status = TRUE;
SELECT service_id, service_name, category, price, duration FROM services WHERE category = 'Facial';
SELECT * FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT service, price FROM spa_reservations JOIN services ON spa_reservations.service = services.service_name;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE membership_status = true;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM services WHERE category = 'Massage';
SELECT customer_name, service_name FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id JOIN services ON preferences.preferred_service = services.service_name;

SELECT customer_name, service_name FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id JOIN services ON preferences.preferred_service = services.service_name WHERE age < 30;
SELECT customer_name, preferred_therapist FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE preferred_therapist = 'Anna';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM spa_reservations;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM services;
SELECT customer_name, service_name, price FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id JOIN services ON preferences.preferred_service = services.service_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM services GROUP BY category;
SELECT therapist, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM spa_reservations GROUP BY therapist;
SELECT customer_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM customers JOIN spa_reservations ON customers.customer_id = spa_reservations.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'S%';

SELECT customer_name, service_name, therapist FROM customers JOIN spa_reservations ON customers.customer_id = spa_reservations.customer_id JOIN services ON spa_reservations.service = services.service_name;

SELECT customer_name, service_name FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id JOIN services ON preferences.preferred_service = services.service_name WHERE membership_status = true;
SELECT * FROM spa_customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM spa_customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM spa_customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM spa_appointments;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, service_type FROM spa_appointments;
SELECT * FROM spa_services;
SELECT service_name, service_price FROM spa_services WHERE service_price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM spa_preferences;
SELECT rating FROM spa_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM spa_ratings;
SELECT customer_id, rating_value FROM spa_ratings WHERE rating_value >= 4;

SELECT customer_name, spa_services.service_name FROM spa_customers JOIN spa_preferences ON spa_customers.customer_id = spa_preferences.customer_id JOIN spa_services ON spa_preferences.service_id = spa_services.service_id;
SELECT customer_name, spa_ratings.rating_value, spa_ratings.review_comment FROM spa_customers JOIN spa_ratings ON spa_customers.customer_id = spa_ratings.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM spa_customers JOIN spa_appointments ON spa_customers.customer_id = spa_appointments.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, service_name, rating FROM spa_customers JOIN spa_preferences ON spa_customers.customer_id = spa_preferences.customer_id JOIN spa_services ON spa_preferences.service_id = spa_services.service_id JOIN spa_ratings ON spa_ratings.customer_id = spa_customers.customer_id AND spa_ratings.service_id = spa_services.service_id;

SELECT customer_name, rating_value, review_comment FROM spa_customers JOIN spa_preferences ON spa_customers.customer_id = spa_preferences.customer_id JOIN spa_ratings ON spa_ratings.customer_id = spa_customers.customer_id AND spa_ratings.service_id = spa_preferences.service_id WHERE review_comment IS NOT NULL;

SELECT customer_name, service_name, review_comment FROM spa_customers JOIN spa_preferences ON spa_customers.customer_id = spa_preferences.customer_id JOIN spa_ratings ON spa_ratings.customer_id = spa_customers.customer_id AND spa_ratings.service_id = spa_preferences.service_id JOIN spa_services ON spa_preferences.service_id = spa_services.service_id WHERE review_comment IS NOT NULL;

SELECT spa_services.service_name, AVG(spa_ratings.rating_value) AS average_rating FROM spa_services JOIN spa_ratings ON spa_services.service_id = spa_ratings.service_id GROUP BY spa_services.service_name;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM spa_customers JOIN spa_appointments ON spa_customers.customer_id = spa_appointments.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_appointments > 5;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(rating_value) AS highest_rating FROM spa_ratings GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM spa_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM spa_customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM spa_customers JOIN spa_appointments ON spa_customers.customer_id = spa_appointments.customer_id;
SELECT s.service_name, s.service_price FROM spa_services s WHERE s.service_price > 50;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.rating FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.rating > 3;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.service_name, r.rating_value FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN spa_services s ON p.service_id = s.service_id JOIN spa_ratings r ON (c.customer_id = r.customer_id AND s.service_id = r.service_id) WHERE r.rating_value = 5;

SELECT c.customer_name, a.appointment_date, a.appointment_time FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_appointments a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE a.appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT c.customer_name, AVG(p.rating) AS avg_rating FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM spa_customers c LEFT JOIN spa_appointments a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT s.service_name, COUNT(r.rating_id) AS num_ratings FROM spa_services s LEFT JOIN spa_ratings r ON s.service_id = r.service_id GROUP BY s.service_name;

SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(s.service_price) AS total_spent FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN spa_services s ON p.service_id = s.service_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, MAX(r.rating_value) AS max_rating FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_ratings r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, MIN(r.rating_value) AS min_rating FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_ratings r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;

SELECT c.customer_name, AVG(s.service_price) AS avg_price FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN spa_services s ON p.service_id = s.service_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.service_name, AVG(r.rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN spa_services s ON p.service_id = s.service_id JOIN spa_ratings r ON (c.customer_id = r.customer_id AND s.service_id = r.service_id) GROUP BY c.customer_name, s.service_name;
SELECT s.service_name, AVG(r.rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM spa_services s JOIN spa_ratings r ON s.service_id = r.service_id GROUP BY s.service_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT p.service_id) AS num_preferences FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.service_name FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN spa_services s ON p.service_id = s.service_id WHERE p.rating = (SELECT MAX(rating) FROM spa_preferences) AND s.service_price > 100;

SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_services, SUM(s.service_price) AS total_spent FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN spa_services s ON p.service_id = s.service_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING total_spent > 500;

SELECT c.customer_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(a.appointment_date, CURDATE())) AS avg_days_between_appointments FROM spa_customers c JOIN spa_appointments a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
